document_data.caption: A map showing the Palace of the Karanoks (labeled #4) in east Luthcheq.
document_data.name: Palace of the Karanoks
document_data.mainbody: The '''Palace of the Karanoks''' was the home of the ruler, typically a member of [[House Karanok]], of the city of [[Luthcheq]] in [[Chessenta]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|4420 Luthcheq}}
document_data.Location: The Palace of the Karanoks was located in eastern Luthcheq along the exterior wall of the city near the east gate.
document_data.Description: The entire structure was separated from the rest of the city by a wall and was accessed via a single gate near its center.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Shala Karanok]] ruled Luthcheq and lived within the Palace in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
